00018 #define NUM_STEPS 2

00024 class ThreadableInterface
00025 {
00026     friend class Network;
00027     friend class PlasticityManager;
00028 public:
00029     virtual ~ThreadableInterface() {}
00030     template <int Num> void launch();
00031 protected:
00032     virtual void operation() = 0;
00033 };
00034 
00035 
00036 template <class Type, int Num>
00037 void * threadable_object(void * arg)
00038 {
00039     (static_cast<Type *>(arg))->template launch<Num>();
00040     pthread_exit(0);
00041     return 0;
00042 }
00043 
00044 
00045 class Network;
00046 
00047 class Threading
00048 {
00049     friend class ThreadableInterface;
00050 public:
00051     static void init(const Network & net);
00052     static void launch_sim(Network & net);
00053 
00054 private:
00055     static void lock() {
00056         pthread_mutex_lock(& Threading::mutex_barrier_);
00057     }
00058     static void unlock() {
00059         pthread_mutex_unlock(& Threading::mutex_barrier_);
00060     }
00061     static void post_grl() {
00062         sem_post(& Threading::sem_grl_);
00063     }
00064 
00065     static pthread_mutex_t mutex_barrier_;
00066     static pthread_t act_mech_threads[NUM_THREADS];
00067     static pthread_t plast_threads[NUM_THREADS];
00068     static sem_t sem_grl_;
00069     static sem_t sem_[NUM_STEPS];
00070     static Size thread_count_[NUM_STEPS];
00071 
00072     typedef std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<ThreadableInterface> > ListThreadObjType;
00073     static ListThreadObjType actmech_obj_;
00074     static ListThreadObjType plast_obj_;
00075 };
00076 
00077 
00078 template <int Num>
00079 void ThreadableInterface::launch()
00080 {
00081     sem_wait(& Threading::sem_[Num]);
00082 
00083     while (SimEnv::i_time() < SimEnv::i_duration()) {
00084         operation();
00085 
00086         Threading::lock();
00087         --Threading::thread_count_[Num];
00088         if (Threading::thread_count_[Num] == 0) Threading::post_grl();
00089         Threading::unlock();
00090 
00091         sem_wait(& Threading::sem_[Num]);
00092     }
00093 }
